duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all operational facets of relationships with CSO Direct Channel (MS Stores), including Supply Chain Execution, Processes, Inventory Management, Reporting, Process Optimization, and Global Shipping Strategy.

Manage all SAP order management processes for CSO Direct Channel, including executing multi-channel PO and item level transactions, facilitating order creation, modification, and cancellation requests.

Gather feedback from planning, CSS, supply chain, and the CSO Direct Channel business group to resolve open order issues in a timely fashion, and create and maintain ad hoc performance and financial reports.
Administer SAP testing associated with new or updated CSO Direct Channel Order Management functionality, and maintain dashboards and process documentation for CSO Direct Channel management.
Conduct re-occurring weekly meetings with MSCIS BPO Order Management team to ensure all Order management processes are up to date, and manage and maintain all PO, shipment, and AP related issues.

Represent Supply Chain for the AOC commercial channel with Sales, manage all internal order requests and route appropriately, and manage communications with distribution, transportation, merchandising, and sales teams.

Serve as Test Lead for MS Store Online Geo Expansion sites within Americas, create/review all test cases scenarios, schedule tests, manage test execution team, track test cases and results, and drive bug resolution with IT teams.
Balance strategic concepts/goals with tactical tasks, and deal well with ambiguity.

Create and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote freight and logistics services, lead a team of marketing specialists, analyze market trends and customer behavior to identify growth opportunities, manage the company's online presence, and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
